name: Chthonian
movement_rule: Instead of moving, roll a die. On a 4-6, all investigators in Arkham lose 1 Stamina.

name: Dhole
abilities: physical resistance, magical resistance, overwhelming, nightmarish

name: Dimensional Shambler
combat_rules: If you fail a Combat check against Dimensional Shambler, you are lost in time and space.

name: Elder Thing
evade_rules: When you fail an Evade check, you must discard 1 of your Weapons or Spells.
combat_rules: When you fail a Combat check against Elder Thing, you must discard 1 of your Weapons or Spells (your choice), if able.

name: Haunter of the Dark
combat_rules: If the Blackest Night ccard is in play, Haunter of the Dark's combat rating increases to -5

name: Hound of Tindalos
movement_rule: When it moves, the Hound of Tindalos moves directly to the nearest investigator inside a location in Arkham (Other than the Hospital or Asylum).

name: Maniac
combat_rules: If the Terror Level is at least 6, Maniac's fight rating increases to -2, his combat damage increases to 3, and he gains Endless.

name: Mi-Go
combat_rules: If you pass a Combat check against Migo, return it to the box and draw 1 Unique Item.

name: Nightgaunt
combat_rules: When you fail a Combat check against Nightgaunt, yooou are draw through the nearest gate.

name: The Black Man
combat_rules: Before making a Horror check, pass a Luck (-1) check or be devoured. If you pass, gain 2 Clue tokens. In either case, return the Black Man to the cup.

name: The Bloated Woman
combat_rules: Before making a Horror check, pass a Will(-2) check or automatically fail the Horror check and the Combat check.

name: The Dark Pharoah
combat_rules: Use Lore in combat with the Dark Pharoah instead of Fight.

name: Warlock
combat_rules: If you pass a Combat check against Warlock, return it to the box and gain 2 Clue Tokens.
